data.text: Yeah. It wasn't like very cold was it really compared to mainland Japan but it really, really did feel cold with the wind there. Like you say, when the cloud came across because there was no hot waterâyeah, it was tough. But did you remember next to the showers, every two weeks or so in the winter, Rio-san would light up theâmake a fire, like wood-burning fire which heated up the outdoor pool?
